    persistent={
        "cluster": {
            "remote": {
                "cluster_one": {
                    "seeds": [
                        "127.0.0.1:{remote-interface-default-port}"
                    ]
                },
                "cluster_two": {
                    "mode": "sniff",
                    "seeds": [
                        "127.0.0.1:{remote-interface-default-port-plus1}"
                    ],
                    "transport.compress": True,
                    "skip_unavailable": True
                },
                "cluster_three": {
                    "mode": "proxy",
                    "proxy_address": "127.0.0.1:{remote-interface-default-port-plus2}"
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
